summary: Represents the sixth routine antenatal care contact (ANC6) for pregnant women, delivering scheduled interventions, applying age‑specific and schedule‑specific care, and arranging the following appointment or inpatient admission when complications arise.
business_intent: Provide a structured, gestational‑age‑appropriate care encounter at around 36 weeks to ensure required ANC6 services are administered and to coordinate subsequent follow‑up or hospitalization, supporting maternal health outcomes.
